name: engram-hotdox-keys
description: 3d models for my hotdox76v2 mapped to Arno's Engram layout

scripts.generate:stl: mkdir -p stl && for f in ./scad/*.scad; do echo $f; openscad-nightly -o stl/$(basename $f .scad).stl $f; done
scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run generate:scad && npm run generate:stl && npm run sort

author: Travis Reed (@dancxjo)
